event_text: m_c fell from a cliff but survived and came back with a tale of a brave grapple worm that will from now on be {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best friend.
m_c finds a grapple worm and decides to carry it around.
m_c has a newfound fascination with worms. Grapple worms, specifically. Now {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} always carries one around.
m_c has a newfound fascination with worms. Grapple worms, specifically. Now {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} always carries one around.
The apprentices of the Clan are taking special strength training to learn how to weaponize stones and boulders in the mountainous landscape.

As a storm rages across the mountain outside, m_c is tucked up in the medicine slugcat den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.
The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today, omen_list_sight... m_c sits on an isolated mountain ledge, considering what the omens foretell.

Through the long, cold night, m_c brings the young slugcats of the Clan with {PRONOUN/m_c/object} down the tunnels. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} words paint an enchanting picture of the ancestors of c_n as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/point/points} out the red pawprints of long dead heroes and villains, telling the Clan's triumphs and failures.
